Line 31: Line 31:
DistroWatch also does not list every distro available. On 2008-08-07 Ubuntu Satanic Edition announced that DistroWatch refused to included them in the list of available distros.<ref>http://ubuntusatanic.org/news/banned-from-distrowatch/</ref> This is despite Distrowatch listing Christian and Muslim editions of Ubuntu, as well as using the [[BSD]] devil logo.
DistroWatch also does not list every distro available. On 2008-08-07 Ubuntu Satanic Edition announced that DistroWatch refused to included them in the list of available distros.<ref>http://ubuntusatanic.org/news/banned-from-distrowatch/</ref> This is despite Distrowatch listing Christian and Muslim editions of Ubuntu, as well as using the [[BSD]] devil logo.
â
DistroWatch has a history of deleting comments in the DistroWatch Weekly made by anyone that criticizes Ubuntu or DistroWatch itself, as well as banning usernames and/or IP addresses of the people who made those comments.
+
DistroWatch has a history of deleting comments in the DistroWatch Weekly made by anyone that criticizes Ubuntu or DistroWatch itself, as well as banning usernames and/or IP addresses of the people who made those comments.{{fact}}
